Toggle Menu

salt.modules.hadoop

Support for hadoop

maintainer

Yann Jouanin <yann.jouanin@intelunix.fr>

maturity

new

depends
platform

linux

dfs

Syntax

salt.modules.hadoop.dfs(
								command=None,
								*args
								)

Details

Execute a command on DFS

CLI Example:

salt '*' hadoop.dfs ls /

dfs_absent

Syntax

salt.modules.hadoop.dfs_absent(
								path
								)

Details

Check if a file or directory is absent on the distributed FS.

CLI Example:

salt '*' hadoop.dfs_absent /some_random_file

Returns True if the file is absent

dfs_present

Syntax

salt.modules.hadoop.dfs_present(
								path
								)

Details

Check if a file or directory is present on the distributed FS.

CLI Example:

salt '*' hadoop.dfs_present /some_random_file

Returns True if the file is present

namenode_format

Syntax

salt.modules.hadoop.namenode_format(
								force=None
								)

Details

Format a name node

salt '*' hadoop.namenode_format force=True

version

Syntax

salt.modules.hadoop.version( )

Details

Return version from hadoop version

CLI Example:

salt '*' hadoop.version
